description._content:
Deseronto High School students, 1934. Principal, Vera Ballance. Photograph taken by E.J. Powell, Hamilton, Ontario.

Notes on the back read: "Deseronto High School Class 1934. Teachers: Miss V. Ballance, Mr E. Baird, Mr J. B. Hough.

"Back row, left to right: Donald Dies, Clinton Toppings, Thomas Vanalstine, Ralph McCabe, Herb Gaulin, Ray Harvey, Morden Sharpe, Arthur Howard, Charlie Sager, Doug Hough, Herbert Brooks, Jack Mathews, Bruce Cole, Evangeline Harrold, Marion Toppings, Ruth Schell, Lee Rowson, Jean Maracle, Gladys Brant, Martha Smith, Agatha Murphy, Patricia Kennelly, Mary Kennelly, Agnes Thompson, Matilda Lavature, Margaret Roach, Margaret Bell, Helen Harvey, Loretta Murphy, Doris Aylesworth, Arthur O'Ray, Max Gaynor.

"Second row, sitting, left to right: Marcella Louis, Jane Kincaid, Edna O'Sullivan, Ruth Germain, Mary Meagher, Teressa Kennedy, Frances McKenny, Helen O'Ray, Margret Fields, Vera Houle, Justin McHenry, Arthur John, Miss Edna Baird, Miss Vera Ballance, Harold Moon, Thomas Vivian, Irene Gonyou, Edith Bruyea, Francis Kennelly, June Thomas, Flossie Dawson, Marjorie Thompson, Lorretta Howell, Bernice Howell, Frances Brant, Monica McHenry, Rita Brennan, Phyllis O'Sullivan, Helen Brennan, Doris Callaghan, Mabel Russell, Isabel Sharpe.

"Front row, boys sitting on ground: Melville Hill, Richard Rogers, Mac Galt, Herchimer Aylesworth, Pat Hetherington, Billy Sharpe, Douglas Kent, Joe Brennan, Harold Callaghan, Lloyd Brant, Isaiah Thompson, Ralph Mitchell."
